resources.string: Touch the screen to charge up the ball. Ghosts will advance towards the ball when it is charging. Avoid ghosts; if they hit the ball, it loses health. When the ball reaches 0 health, it dies and the game is over. When the ball is charged up, run into ghosts to kill them. Ghosts will not advance towards you if you touch the screen while you are charged up. Various items will spawn while you are playing. These items can help you in various ways. Click the items button below to explore the various items there are.
In Easy mode, you start with a Friendly Ghost, the ray gun has no cooldown on shots per second, ghosts do normal damage, and charge runs out slowly.

In Medium mode, you do not start with a Friendly Ghost. Instead, you must earn at least 400 points. A new one appears at every 1000 points after that first 400. Ghosts do normal damage, the ray gun has a slight cooldown on how many rays can be shot per second, and charge runs out at a normal rate.

In Hard mode, you do not start with a Friendly Ghost. Instead, you must earn at least 800 points on your own. A new one appears at every 1000 points after that first 800. In addition, ghosts do double damage, the ray gun has a long cooldown on how many rays can be shot per second, and charge runs out quickly. Also, ghosts do not stop when you stop touching the screen, and will continue in a straight line until stopped by continuous bounces.
Restores some lost health to the ball.
The ghosts become scared of the ball for a short time, causing them to run away from the ball when the screen is touched rather than towards it.
The ball equips a ray gun, giving it the ability to shoot rays with every touch of the screen. These rays pierce ghosts, rewarding 100 points for each ghost killed.
The ball equips a shield, protecting it from the damage of one ghost. If a ghost is killed while wearing a shield, 100 points are awarded.
The ghosts become frozen for a time, preventing them from directing their movement. However, on hard difficulty, the ghosts continue to move; they simply stop tracking the ball on touch.
